attributes.title: Slaughterhouse: Double L Ranch
attributes.description:
Created on March 28, 2011 by mkc330 on Sourcemap.org:

Double L Ranch is independently run and owned by Lowell Carson and his two sons. It is a small operation, and they preform their work with interest and care. Bob Comis brings on average eight pigs a weeks to have slaughtered at Double L Ranch.
